metadata.description: Golden test cases for epistemic audit correctness evaluation

cases.input_text: Apple was founded in 1976.
cases.rationale: Factual temporal claim verified by Wikidata P571 (inception date).

cases.input_text: Elon Musk founded SpaceX.
cases.rationale: Relation claim verified by Wikidata P112 (founded by).

cases.input_text: Paris is the capital of France.
cases.rationale: Factual attribute verified by Wikidata P36 (capital).

cases.input_text: Apple was founded in 1980.
cases.rationale: Temporal contradiction: Wikidata shows 1976, not 1980.

cases.input_text: Steve Jobs invented the internet.
cases.rationale: Entity-role conflict: Internet invention attributed to others (Vint Cerf, Tim Berners-Lee).

cases.input_text: Berlin is the capital of France.
cases.rationale: Object mismatch: Wikidata P36 for France shows Paris, not Berlin.

cases.input_text: The meeting discussed operational challenges.
cases.rationale: Generic claim with no linkable entities or verifiable facts.

cases.input_text: John Smith attended the conference.
cases.rationale: Ambiguous entity (John Smith) cannot be resolved to unique Wikidata ID.

cases.input_text: Elon Musk designed the Falcon 9 rocket engine.

downgrade_reason.issue: AUTHORITY_BLEED detected: technical authorship attributed to executive

cases.rationale: AUTHORITY_BLEED: Leader attributed with engineering work typically done by teams.

cases.input_text: SpaceX launched exactly 47 missions in 2022.

downgrade_reason.issue: UNSUPPORTED_SPECIFICITY: numeric precision not in evidence

cases.rationale: Numeric specificity without supporting evidence triggers UNSUPPORTED_SPECIFICITY.

cases.input_text: Steve Jobs created the Linux kernel.
cases.rationale: ENTITY_ROLE_CONFLICT: Linux creator is Linus Torvalds per Wikidata P170.

cases.input_text: Microsoft was founded in 1990.
cases.rationale: TEMPORAL_FABRICATION: Wikidata shows Microsoft founded 1975.

cases.input_text: The patient received 2000mg of ibuprofen in a single dose.
cases.rationale: IMPOSSIBLE_DOSAGE: Max single ibuprofen dose is 800mg.

cases.input_text: The government mandated vaccines for everyone nationwide.
cases.rationale: SCOPE_OVERGENERALIZATION: Universal mandate claim without qualifiers.

cases.input_text: The Supreme Court ruled on the local zoning dispute.
cases.rationale: COURT_AUTHORITY_MISATTRIBUTION: Local zoning is not Supreme Court jurisdiction.

cases.input_text: Tim Cook personally engineered the M1 chip architecture.

downgrade_reason.original_evidence: May have entity linking success but AUTHORITY_BLEED downgrades

cases.rationale: Tests downgrade chain: Entity resolves -> Evidence exists -> AUTHORITY_BLEED detected -> UNCERTAIN.

cases.input_text: Satya Nadella coded the Windows 11 kernel.
cases.rationale: CEO attributed with low-level technical work.

cases.input_text: Xyzzy Plugh founded Zork Industries in 2015.

downgrade_reason.issue: Entity resolution failed: no Wikidata match

cases.rationale: Fabricated entities cannot be linked, triggering INSUFFICIENT_EVIDENCE.

cases.input_text: Apple was reportedly founded around 1976.
cases.rationale: Hedged claim still verifiable; hedging reduces confidence but not verdict.

cases.input_text: Apple was founded in 1976 by Steve Jobs and Steve Wozniak. Microsoft was founded in 1975 by Bill Gates.
cases.rationale: Multi-claim extraction: all claims verifiable.

cases.input_text: Apple was founded in 1976. Steve Jobs invented the internet.
cases.rationale: Mixed verdicts: one true, one false attribution.

cases.input_text: Google was founded in 2010. Amazon was founded in 2005. Microsoft was founded in 1990.
cases.rationale: All claims have incorrect dates, triggering HIGH risk.

cases.input_text: Google was founded in 1998. Amazon was founded in 1994. Microsoft was founded in 1975.
cases.rationale: All claims correct, LOW risk.

cases.input_text: The quarterly report mentioned increased revenue. Sales figures improved. Market conditions remained stable. Customer satisfaction was high.

downgrade_reason.issue: Sanity rule: >3 claims with zero SUPPORTED triggers INSUFFICIENT->UNCERTAIN downgrade

cases.rationale: Generic business claims with no verifiable entities trigger sanity rule.
